case.title: Effervescent! Just the way you like me - 33 (London)
case.text:
Hey!
oh yes, I am effervescent, smart and funny Id say, have a good sense of humour and love smiling.
Big, Tattoos, beard optional, with an accent, possibly American - that's you, not me! But you can surprise me otherwise ;)
Love rock n roll, the sunshine, happy people, wine and bourbon - randomly picked in my "I love" list VS Selfishness, arrogance and ignorance (and house music ha ha)
I am not sure what I am looking for, I am just throwing the bait and see what I will reel in ;)
Keep smiling people!
